gov.anl.ipns.Util.File
Interface IXmlIO

All Known Implementing Classes:
Position3D, Position3D_d
public interface IXmlIO

Interface for objects that can read and write themselves in XML format to byte streams.

Field Summary
static int BASE64
           
static int NORMAL
           
 
Method Summary
 boolean XMLread(java.io.InputStream stream)
          Read the state of this object from the specified stream in XML format.

          Write the state of this object out to the specified stream in XML format.

Method Detail

XMLwrite

boolean XMLwrite(java.io.OutputStream stream,
                 int mode)
Write the state of this object out to the specified stream in XML format.

Parameters:
stream - The stream to write to.
mode - Flag indicating whether or not to write the value in base 64 encoding.
Returns:
true if the write was successful, false otherwise.

XMLread

boolean XMLread(java.io.InputStream stream)
Read the state of this object from the specified stream in XML format.

Parameters:
stream - The stream to read from.
Returns:
true if the read was successful, false otherwise.
